metadata.name: ReviewInsight
metadata.title: Transform App Reviews Into Business Intelligence | ReviewInsight
metadata.description: ReviewInsight analyzes app reviews to extract business intelligence, helping you discover user insights, pain points, and market opportunities through AI-powered analysis.
metadata.keywords: ReviewInsight, App Review Analysis, Business Intelligence, AI Analysis, User Insights, Market Research

sign_in.title: Sign In
sign_in.description: Sign in to your account to continue analyzing app reviews

sign_up.title: Create your account
sign_up.description: Start analyzing app reviews with AI in minutes
sign_up.please_agree_terms: Please agree to the terms and conditions

validation.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.password_no_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.password_no_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.password_no_number: Password must contain at least one number

verification.title: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to your email
verification.check_spam: Check your spam folder if you don't see the email
verification.invalid_code: Invalid verification code. Please try again.

forgot_password.title: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.description: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions.

success.title: Check your email
success.description: We've sent a password reset link to
success.check_spam: If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.

reset_password.title: Set new password
reset_password.description: Your new password must be different from previous used passwords.
reset_password.password_updated_description: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now sign in with your new password.
reset_password.invalid_link_description: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
reset_password.token_expired_description: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
reset_password.token_invalid_description: This password reset link is invalid. Please request a new one.

validation.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.password_no_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.password_no_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.password_no_number: Password must contain at least one number

billing.title: Billing & Usage
billing.description: Manage your subscription and monitor your usage

current_plan.title: Current Plan
current_plan.description: Your current subscription details and usage
current_plan.no_active_plan_description: You're currently on the free plan. Upgrade to get more credits and features.
current_plan.yearly_subscription_note: ðŸ’¡ Yearly subscription note: Credits reset monthly, but billing occurs yearly. You'll receive new credit allocation each month, but will only be charged for the next year when your subscription expires.
current_plan.monthly_subscription_note: ðŸ’¡ Monthly subscription note: Credits reset monthly, and billing occurs monthly. You'll receive new credit allocation each month, and will be charged monthly for your subscription.

upgrade.title: Upgrade Your Plan
upgrade.description: Choose a plan that fits your needs

recharge_modal.recharge_description: Select a recharge plan to add credits to your account

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.tip: Please keep your apikey safe to avoid leaks

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: News, resources, and updates about ShipAny

my_invites.title: My Invites
my_invites.invite_tip: Invite 1 friend to buy ShipAny, reward $50.
my_invites.no_orders: You can't invite others before you bought ShipAny
my_invites.no_affiliates: You're not allowed to invite others, please contact us to apply for permission.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear your thoughts on the product or how we can improve the experience.
feedback.rating_tip: What do you think of ShipAny?

sign_card.description: Analyze any app's reviews instantly with AI-powered insights and interactive chat to discover hidden opportunities.

features.title: AI-Powered Analysis
features.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyze millions of reviews to extract meaningful insights and patterns.

features.title: Interactive AI Chat
features.description: Ask questions and dig deeper into insights, have conversations to explore data comprehensively.

features.title: Pain Point Detection
features.description: Automatically identify user frustrations, feature requests, and improvement opportunities from review sentiment.

verification.title: Email Verification
verification.subject: Verify your email address - {projectName}
verification.description: Thanks for signing up! To complete your registration, please verify your email address using the code below.
verification.ignore_message: If you didn't request this email verification, please ignore this message.

reset_password.title: Password Reset
reset_password.subject: Reset your password - {projectName}
reset_password.description: We received a request to reset your password for your {projectName} account. If you made this request, click the button below to set a new password.
reset_password.ignore_message: If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: Click upload button to upload a custom one
avatar.optional_tip: An avatar is optional but strongly recommended

name.title: Name
name.validation_tip: Please use 3-30 characters for your name

messages.nickname_length: Nickname must be between 3 and 30 characters

summary.title: Generate Enhanced Report
summary.description: This will generate a comprehensive analysis report of your reviews. Please confirm to continue.
summary.subscription_required_desc: Enhanced report generation requires an active subscription. Please upgrade your plan to access this feature.
summary.subscription_credits_desc: This operation will consume subscription credits from your active plan.
